code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import cheerio from'cheerio';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PitchforkArticles=_ref=>{let{numArticles=4}=_ref;const[articles,setArticles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPitchforkArticles=async()=>{const url="https://pitchfork.com/news/";try{const response=await axios.get(url);const $=cheerio.load(response.data);const fetchedArticles=$('.module.latest-module.collection-module.news-module.latest-module--horizontal').slice(0,numArticles).map((index,element)=>{const title=$(element).find('h2').text();const image=$(element).find('img').attr('src');const articleUrl=$(element).find('a').attr('href');return{title,image,articleUrl};}).get();setArticles(fetchedArticles);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching articles:',error);}};fetchPitchforkArticles();},[numArticles]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"",children:articles.map((article,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.image,className:"card-img-top",alt:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://pitchfork.com".concat(article.articleUrl),className:"",children:"Read More"})]})]})},index))})});};export default PitchforkArticles;
